description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: For each spell you played targeting only allies this game, <link=vocab.Animate><style=Vocab>animate</style></link> it. The animated spells start a free attack.
descriptionRaw: Play: For each spell you played targeting only allies this game, animate it. The animated spells start a free attack.
flavorText: It is said that the Lonely Master carves away evil in search of his lost pupil...
name: Spirit Blossom Master Yi

description:
Give an ally (<style=Variable>+0|+0</style>) this round. Increase the buff by +1|+1 for each other time you've cast this this game.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Spirit Blossom Master Yi</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally (+0|+0) this round. Increase the buff by +1|+1 for each other time you've cast this this game.
Create a Spirit Blossom Master Yi in your deck.
flavorText: Through repetition, precision.
name: Master Yi's Practice Makes Perfect

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: For each spell you played targeting only allies this game, <link=vocab.Animate><style=Vocab>animate</style></link> it. The animated spells start a free attack.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: If there are enemies, I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> them and <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Play: For each spell you played targeting only allies this game, animate it. The animated spells start a free attack.
Attack: If there are enemies, I strike them and Recall.
flavorText: ...but the shadows of the past will never be at peace, for the Lonely Master will not cease his eternal search.
name: The Lonely Master

flavorText: From shadow and light, the Lonely Master's will is manifest.
name: Blademaster's Phantom

description: When I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy with less Health than me, remove me from combat and <link=vocab.Charm><style=Vocab>Charm</style></link> it, attacking.
descriptionRaw: When I Challenge an enemy with less Health than me, remove me from combat and Charm it, attacking.
flavorText: To be free of pain and fear, pray to the Sorrow Eater.
name: Spirit Blossom Evelynn

description:
Deal 3 to a unit and grant that much Health to an ally.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Spirit Blossom Evelynn</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 3 to a unit and grant that much Health to an ally.
Create a Spirit Blossom Evelynn in your deck.
flavorText: The Sorrow Eater will hold you close, and your enemies closer.
name: Evelynn's Spirit's Embrace

description:
When I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy with less Health than me, remove me from combat and <link=vocab.Charm><style=Vocab>Charm</style></link> it, attacking.
<link=vocab.Stolen><style=Vocab>Stolen</style></link> allies have <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link> 4.
descriptionRaw:
When I Challenge an enemy with less Health than me, remove me from combat and Charm it, attacking.
Stolen allies have Impact 4.
flavorText: “Free yourself of those troublesome feelings!”
name: The Sorrow Eater

flavorText: Take joy in the hunt eternal.
name: The Beast

description:
<link=vocab.Stolen><style=Vocab>Stolen</style></link> allies have +1|+1.
<link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> allies have +1|+1.
descriptionRaw:
Stolen allies have +1|+1.
Ephemeral allies have +1|+1.
flavorText: "I didn't steal anything! I, uh, liberated it."
name: Shadow Swindler

flavorText: “Cute, aren’t they?” – The Fox Spirit
name: Fox-Fire

description: Deal 3 to a unit and grant that much Health to an ally.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to a unit and grant that much Health to an ally.
flavorText: The Sorrow Eater will hold you close, and your enemies closer.
name: Spirit's Embrace

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Plant 3 <link=card.trap><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
When the opponent draws a trapped card, deal 1 to all enemies.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Plant 3 Poison Puffcaps in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
When the opponent draws a trapped card, deal 1 to all enemies.
levelupDescription: The opponent has drawn 5 trapped cards. <style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: The opponent has drawn 5 trapped cards.
flavorText: "I always say that the real joy of gifts is in the giving."
name: Spirit Blossom Teemo

description:
Discard a card to deal 4 to an enemy and plant 4 <link=card.trap><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on copies of it in the opponent's deck.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Spirit Blossom Teemo</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Discard a card to deal 4 to an enemy and plant 4 Poison Puffcaps on copies of it in the opponent's deck.
Create a Spirit Blossom Teemo in your deck.
flavorText: This prank would be his magnum opus, eternally remembered as "The Night of One Thousand Mushrooms."
name: Teemo's Shroomsplosion!

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link> or <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Plant 3 <link=card.trap><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
When the opponent draws a trapped card, deal 3 to all enemies.
descriptionRaw:
Play or Nexus Strike: Plant 3 Poison Puffcaps in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
When the opponent draws a trapped card, deal 3 to all enemies.
flavorText: "Just kidding! The real gift was all the pranks we pulled along the way!"
name: The Prankster King

description: Grant <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Grant Ephemeral allies everywhere +1|+1.
flavorText: “N-never forget to feed the foxes!” – Mo Tsui, recently deceased
name: Final Blessing

description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>The Beast</style></link> <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Summon a The Beast Challenging an enemy.
flavorText: For the Beast, fear turns a chase into a game.
name: Unleashed Frenzy

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy to <link=vocab.GatherStorm><style=Vocab>Gather Storm</style></link> twice.
descriptionRaw: Recall an enemy to Gather Storm twice.
flavorText: "Be still... the wind gathers its fury."
name: Last Breath

description:
I can't take damage or die.
When I damage an enemy, mark it.
descriptionRaw:
I can't take damage or die.
When I damage an enemy, mark it.
levelupDescription: Once 5 marked enemies have died and I see a <link=card.wolf><style=AssociatedCard>The Beast</style></link> attack, we combine and level up.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: Once 5 marked enemies have died and I see a The Beast attack, we combine and level up.
flavorText: "These lost souls. So Precious. So blissfully unaware."
name: The Taker

description:
Mark a random enemy, or spend 4 mana to deal 3 to all marked enemies.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>The Taker</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Mark a random enemy, or spend 4 mana to deal 3 to all marked enemies.
Create a The Taker in your deck.
flavorText: Those who bear the mark of death must flee... or fall.
name: Kindred's Dance of Arrows

description:
Deal 3 to all marked enemies.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>The Taker</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 3 to all marked enemies.
Create a The Taker in your deck.
flavorText: Those who bear the mark of death must flee... or fall.
name: Kindred's Dance of Arrows

description:
Mark a random enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>The Taker</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Mark a random enemy.
Create a The Taker in your deck.
flavorText: Those who bear the mark of death must flee... or fall.
name: Kindred's Dance of Arrows

description:
I can't take damage or die.
Enemies are marked.
<link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Beast's Frenzy</style></link> makes me attack instead.
descriptionRaw:
I can't take damage or die.
Enemies are marked.
Beast's Frenzy makes me attack instead.
flavorText: My dear Beast, let us guide them to the world beyond.
name: Spirit Blossom Kindred

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.GatherStorm><style=Vocab>Gather Storm</style></link> an amount of times equal to my Power.
descriptionRaw: Play: Gather Storm an amount of times equal to my Power.
flavorText: "Hone your mind until it is as your blade: sharp enough to cleave deceit, strong enough to withstand the storm."
name: Stormblade Sage

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Exchange me for an enemy follower with less Health than me.
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Deal 1 to all allies.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Exchange me for an enemy follower with less Health than me.
Round End: Deal 1 to all allies.
flavorText: Sorrow is ever-present... and there are always those who willingly indulge in it.
name: Occult Opportunist

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick 1 of 3 single target spells you've played on allies this game and play it onto me.
descriptionRaw: Play: Pick 1 of 3 single target spells you've played on allies this game and play it onto me.
flavorText: The Prodigy struck once, twice. Beneath the Lonely Master's mask was the ghost of a smile.
name: The Prodigy's Shade

description:
When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Fox-Fire</style></link>.
When another ally dies, grant me +1|+0.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, summon a Fox-Fire.
When another ally dies, grant me +1|+0.
flavorText: Some spirits who stray from the path never find their way back.
name: Essence Thief

description: Summon an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of an enemy follower.
descriptionRaw: Summon an exact Ephemeral copy of an enemy follower.
flavorText: Mortal lives are so fleeting.
name: Fleeting Spirits

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Fox-Fire</style></link> with stats equal to the cost of the most expensive spell you've played this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon an attacking Fox-Fire with stats equal to the cost of the most expensive spell you've played this game.
flavorText: Well, now that I'm here I might as well have some fun. Who's up for a spirited chase?
name: Spirit Blossom Ahri

description:
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Fox-Fire</style></link> with stats equal to the cost of the most expensive spell you've played this game.
When you're attacked, summon one to defend. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
Attack: Summon an attacking Fox-Fire with stats equal to the cost of the most expensive spell you've played this game.
When you're attacked, summon one to defend.
flavorText: At times whimsical, others cruel, the Fox Spirit’s mysterious methods haunt those who challenge her path.
name: The Fox Spirit

description:
Deal 2 to an enemy unit, or spend 4 mana to deal 6 to an enemy unit.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Spirit Blossom Ahri</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 to an enemy unit, or spend 4 mana to deal 6 to an enemy unit.
Create a Spirit Blossom Ahri in your deck.
flavorText: Ancient spirits gather and swirl, enchanted by the Gatekeeper’s will.
name: Ahri's Orb of Deception

description:
Deal 6 to an enemy unit. 
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Spirit Blossom Ahri</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 6 to an enemy unit. 
Create a Spirit Blossom Ahri in your deck.
flavorText: Ancient spirits gather and swirl, enchanted by the Gatekeeper’s will.
name: Ahri's Orb of Deception

description:
Deal 2 to an enemy unit.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Spirit Blossom Ahri</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 to an enemy unit.
Create a Spirit Blossom Ahri in your deck.
flavorText: Ancient spirits gather and swirl, enchanted by the Gatekeeper’s will.
name: Ahri's Orb of Deception

description: Summon a 3|3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Fox-Fire</style></link> <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> an enemy, or spend 8 mana to summon a 1|1 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Fox-Fire</style></link> <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> EACH enemy.
descriptionRaw: Summon a 3|3 Fox-Fire Challenging an enemy, or spend 8 mana to summon a 1|1 Fox-Fire Challenging EACH enemy.
flavorText: A game of chase is all that separates life from death.
name: Spirit Rush

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: <link=vocab.GatherStorm><style=Vocab>Gather Storm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Gather Storm.
flavorText: The echoes of warriors past rise to the call of battle.
name: Shades of Battles Past

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Grief's Lesson</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create a Grief's Lesson in hand.
flavorText: When the lessons end, the journey begins.
name: Fallen Student

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Mark an enemy.
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> all marked enemies.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Mark an enemy.
Round End: I strike all marked enemies.
flavorText: Hide and seek. Such an innocent game. Such deadly consequences.
name: Patient Beast

description:
I can't be a <link=vocab.StormTarget><style=Vocab>Storm Conduit</style></link>. I cost 1 less for each time you've <link=vocab.GatherStorm><style=Vocab>Gathered Storm</style></link> this game.
When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw:
I can't be a Storm Conduit. I cost 1 less for each time you've Gathered Storm this game.
When I'm summoned, Obliterate the strongest enemy.
flavorText: "And at the grave of his brother, the Younger did kneel, for he knew they were victims of tragedy, both." -The Tale of the Warring Brothers
name: Spirit Blossom Yasuo

description:
I can't be a <link=vocab.StormTarget><style=Vocab>Storm Conduit</style></link>. 
I cost 1 less for each time you've <link=vocab.GatherStorm><style=Vocab>Gathered Storm</style></link> this game.
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw:
I can't be a Storm Conduit. 
I cost 1 less for each time you've Gathered Storm this game.
When I'm summoned or Attack: Obliterate the strongest enemy.
flavorText: "But as the river winds along the well-worn path, so too are we shaped by those we have followed. Even now, the Younger walks in the Elder's footsteps." -The Tale of the Warring Brothers
name: The Younger Brother

description:
<link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy to <link=vocab.GatherStorm><style=Vocab>Gather Storm</style></link> twice.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Spirit Blossom Yasuo</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Recall an enemy to Gather Storm twice.
Create a Spirit Blossom Yasuo in your deck.
flavorText: "Be still... the wind gathers its fury."
name: Yasuo's Last Breath

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy to reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 3.
descriptionRaw: Recall an enemy to reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 3.
flavorText: "Be still... the wind gathers its fury."
name: Unleash the Storm

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Your opponent draws 2 and discards 2 cards.
descriptionRaw: Play: Your opponent draws 2 and discards 2 cards.
flavorText: "Nonesense! Of course you have room for thirds, dearie."
name: Grandma Enoki

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to <link=vocab.Charm><style=Vocab>Charm</style></link> an enemy follower.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally to Charm an enemy follower.
flavorText: What's more captivating than a well-timed sacrifice?
name: Fated Supplicant

description: When you target an enemy, mark it.
descriptionRaw: When you target an enemy, mark it.
flavorText: To keen eyes, a mortal's dance with death is foretold.
name: Death's Seer

description: When you play a spell, give me +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: When you play a spell, give me +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: In death, one learns to weave the magicks of life.
name: Spirit Aspirant

description: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a 6+ cost follower and make it a <link=vocab.StormTarget><style=Vocab>Storm Conduit</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Manifest a 6+ cost follower and make it a Storm Conduit.
flavorText: Drawn to the freshly fallen petals, the spirits gather. Awaiting the word of one to guide them home.
name: Commune With Spirits

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Mark the enemy that killed me.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Mark the enemy that killed me.
flavorText: Tampering with the Taker's kin is a life-threatening endeavor.
name: Vengeful Imp

description: Discard a card to deal 4 to an enemy and plant 4 <link=card.trap><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on copies of it in the opponent's deck.
descriptionRaw: Discard a card to deal 4 to an enemy and plant 4 Poison Puffcaps on copies of it in the opponent's deck.
flavorText: This prank would be his magnum opus, eternally remembered as "The Night of One Thousand Mushrooms."
name: Shroomsplosion!

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy follower. <link=vocab.Charm><style=Vocab>Charm</style></link> it at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy follower. Charm it at the next Round Start.
flavorText: "They don't run. They wait to be taken."
name: Bewitch

description: Give an ally (<style=Variable>+1|+1</style>) this round. Increase the buff by +1|+1 for each other time you've cast this this game.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally (+1|+1) this round. Increase the buff by +1|+1 for each other time you've cast this this game.
flavorText: Through repetition, precision.
name: Practice Makes Perfect

description: Summon a 1|1 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Fox-Fire</style></link> <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> EACH enemy.
descriptionRaw: Summon a 1|1 Fox-Fire Challenging EACH enemy.
flavorText: A game of chase is all that separates life from death.
name: Spirit Rush

description: Summon a 3|3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Fox-Fire</style></link> <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Summon a 3|3 Fox-Fire Challenging an enemy.
flavorText: A game of chase is all that separates life from death.
name: Spirit Rush

description: Deal 2 to an enemy unit, or spend 4 mana to deal 6 to an enemy unit.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to an enemy unit, or spend 4 mana to deal 6 to an enemy unit.
flavorText: Ancient spirits gather and swirl, enchanted by the Gatekeeper’s will.
name: Orb of Deception

description: Mark a random enemy, or spend 4 mana to deal 3 to all marked enemies.
descriptionRaw: Mark a random enemy, or spend 4 mana to deal 3 to all marked enemies.
flavorText: Those who bear the mark of death must flee... or fall.
name: Dance of Arrows

description: Draw 1 and grant it a random Common item, or spend 3 mana to draw 1 and grant it a random Epic item.
descriptionRaw: Draw 1 and grant it a random Common item, or spend 3 mana to draw 1 and grant it a random Epic item.
flavorText: When the Spirit Blossoms bloom, each petal tells a tale.
name: Petals of Fate

description: When I'm summoned, plant a <link=card.trap><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcap</style></link> on the top card of the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, plant a Poison Puffcap on the top card of the enemy deck.
flavorText: "Mmmm... Nothing beats Nana's sweet mushroom pie."
name: Roo, Playful Prankster

description: Draw 1 and grant  it a random Common item.
descriptionRaw: Draw 1 and grant  it a random Common item.
flavorText: When the Spirit Blossoms bloom, each petal tells a tale.
name: Petals of Fate

description: Draw 1 and grant  it a random Epic item.
descriptionRaw: Draw 1 and grant  it a random Epic item.
flavorText: When the Spirit Blossoms bloom, each petal tells a tale.
name: Petals of Fate

description: Deal 6 to an enemy unit.
descriptionRaw: Deal 6 to an enemy unit.
flavorText: Ancient spirits gather and swirl, enchanted by the Gatekeeper’s will.
name: Orb of Deception

description: Deal 2 to an enemy unit.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to an enemy unit.
flavorText: Ancient spirits gather and swirl, enchanted by the Gatekeeper’s will.
name: Orb of Deception

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Refill your spell mana.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Refill your spell mana.
flavorText: A wise kanmei once said, a soul at peace is easily rejuvenated.
name: Serene Spirit

description: Give an ally (<style=Variable>+0|+0</style>) this round. The buff is equal to the highest attack and health among allies that died this game.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally (+0|+0) this round. The buff is equal to the highest attack and health among allies that died this game.
flavorText: They say the fallen lend their strength to those who remain.
name: Grief's Lesson

description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>The Beast</style></link> <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> a marked enemy.
descriptionRaw: Summon a The Beast Challenging a marked enemy.
name: Beast's Frenzy

description: Deal 3 to all marked enemies.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to all marked enemies.
flavorText: Those who bear the mark of death must flee... or fall.
name: Dance of Arrows

description: Mark a random enemy.
descriptionRaw: Mark a random enemy.
flavorText: Those who bear the mark of death must flee... or fall.
name: Dance of Arrows

description: When you play another cost reduced card, grant me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When you play another cost reduced card, grant me +1|+1.
flavorText: "I am only the beginning. Others will rise with the wind."
name: Arisen Soul

description: <link=vocab.Charm><style=Vocab>Charm</style></link> an enemy follower.
descriptionRaw: Charm an enemy follower.
flavorText: It is said that one glimpse of the Sorrow Eater awakens a terrible longing.
name: Beckoning Gaze

description: Pick 1 of 3 non-champion cards from the enemy hand to draw. They draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Pick 1 of 3 non-champion cards from the enemy hand to draw. They draw 1.
flavorText: Quick hands, sticky fingers.
name: Yoink!

description: Play a Destiny Card.
descriptionRaw: Play a Destiny Card.
flavorText: Something up my sleeve.
name: Wild Card

description: Deal 7 and <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Deal 7 and Stun the strongest enemy.
flavorText: "All that glitters..." - Twisted Fate
name: Gold Card

description:
Refill 2 spell mana.
Draw 2.
descriptionRaw:
Refill 2 spell mana.
Draw 2.
flavorText: "Blue as the Serpentine." - Twisted Fate
name: Blue Card

description: When you draw a card, <link=vocab.Terrify><style=Vocab>Terrify</style></link> 1.
descriptionRaw: When you draw a card, Terrify 1.
flavorText: "I made a new friend today, a mermaid! She wanted me to swim with her and offered to teach me! I'm sneaking out after supper to see her!" - Poe Buckler, current whereabouts unknown
name: Shallows Siren

description: Deal 2 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Somethin' for everyone." - Twisted Fate
name: Red Card

description: Each round, the first time I kill an enemy, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Midnight Raid</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time I kill an enemy, create a Midnight Raid in hand.
flavorText: "You’re right! General Medarda doesn't respect me as a fighter, nor as a strategist! I've put in the effort to move up in rank. It's time to give her a piece of my mind!" - Unnamed Noxian soldier (presumed deceased)
name: Ambessa

description:
An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy. If it dies, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ambessa</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
An ally strikes an enemy. If it dies, Rally.
Create a Ambessa in your deck.
flavorText: When enough of us had gathered, the general went on about what it meant to be a Noxian. Then heads began to roll, and I realized we'd been conquered. - Valijska Tuco, conscripted soldier
name: Ambessa's Public Execution

description: Each round, the first time I kill an enemy, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time I kill an enemy, Rally.
flavorText: "Well… I took your advice and stood my ground with General Medarda. She told me I was 'expendable,' merely 'a pawn' and that I'd be 'better off dead' than wasting her time. I’m just going to keep my head down... while I still have it." - Unnamed Noxian soldier (presumed deceased)
name: Ambessa

description: Summon an exact copy of an allied follower.
descriptionRaw: Summon an exact copy of an allied follower.
flavorText: “You have been selected for the highest of honors: serving Noxus. You will make the empire proud, and for that you will die a hero.” - notice of Noxian conscription
name: Conscription

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> backrow enemy.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Stun the strongest backrow enemy.
flavorText: None amongst Ambessa Medarda's warbands embodied the Principles of Strength as Rictus did. He proved himself worthy of his general's trust, time and time again.
name: Rictus

description: An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy. If it dies, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: An ally strikes an enemy. If it dies, Rally.
flavorText: When enough of us had gathered, the general went on about what it meant to be a Noxian. Then heads began to roll, and I realized we'd been conquered. - Valijska Tuco, conscripted soldier
name: Public Execution

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. If it's already <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link>, deal 6 to it instead.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy. If it's already Stunned, deal 6 to it instead.
flavorText: The battlefield is no place for mercy. Like the wolf, we strike at the first opportunity.
name: Sundering Slam

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sundering Slam</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy. Create a Sundering Slam in hand.
flavorText: Like the desert fox, we watch and listen, and range far.
name: Cunning Sweep

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create an exact copy of a spell in hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Create an exact copy of a spell in hand.
flavorText: “Exploit their ignorance. True deception can fool even the sharpest minds.” – unnamed Black Rose mage
name: Elora

description: Deal damage to an enemy equal to its Power.
descriptionRaw: Deal damage to an enemy equal to its Power.
flavorText: “It seems you’re unfamiliar with the Golden Rule.” - Mel Medarda
name: Rebuttal

description:
Your spells targeting enemies have <link=keyword.SpellOverwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
When I'm summoned or allies attack, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Radiant Volley</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Your spells targeting enemies have Overwhelm.
When I'm summoned or allies attack, create a Radiant Volley in hand.
flavorText: “I see it now. The corruption behind the Progress. I had hoped it wouldn’t come to this… but perhaps compromise is no longer an option. No matter, my countermeasures are already in place.”
name: Mel

description: Deal 1 to a unit.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to a unit.
flavorText: "“Apologies… This may burn.” - Mel Medarda
name: Radiant Volley

description:
Deal damage to an enemy equal to its Power.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Mel</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal damage to an enemy equal to its Power.
Create a Mel in your deck.
flavorText: “It seems you’re unfamiliar with the Golden Rule.” - Mel Medarda
name: Mel's Rebuttal

description:
Your spells targeting enemies have <link=keyword.SpellOverwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
When I'm summoned or allies attack, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Radiant Volleys</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Your spells targeting enemies have Overwhelm.
When I'm summoned or allies attack, create 2 Radiant Volleys in hand.
flavorText: “Piltovan or Noxian. Medarda or Mage. The Wolf or the Fox. They know not what I am, but they will never forget what I can do.”
name: Mel

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> a damaged enemy.
descriptionRaw: Play: I strike a damaged enemy.
levelupDescription: You've dealt damage 12+ times this game.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've dealt damage 12+ times this game.
flavorText: "'Claws like knives and glowing red eyes'? Sounds like the ramblings of those shimmered-up lunatics, but if the Sheriff insists… I'll trek down there and check it out." - Piltovan Enforcer (trainee)
name: Warwick

description: Deal 1 to a unit or Nexus, and 1 to another. Then, grant all damaged enemies <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to a unit or Nexus, and 1 to another. Then, grant all damaged enemies Vulnerable.
flavorText: “It was a beast, one of those screwed up chemtech things. All teeth and claws. And when the screaming stopped... there was nothin' but bits of meat and bone.” - Zaunite miner
name: Blood Hunt

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> a damaged enemy.
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> a random damaged enemy.
descriptionRaw:
Play: I strike a damaged enemy.
Round End: I strike a random damaged enemy.
flavorText: "Torn limb from limb, the deceased enforcer appears to have succumbed to blood loss. The claw marks match those found on the unidentified remains in the Sump. Just what kind of monster are we dealing with?" - Coroner
name: Warwick

description:
Deal 1 to a unit or Nexus, and 1 to another. Then, grant all damaged enemies <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Warwick</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to a unit or Nexus, and 1 to another. Then, grant all damaged enemies Vulnerable.
Create a Warwick in your deck.
flavorText: “It was a beast, one of those screwed up chemtech things. All teeth and claws. And when the screaming stopped... there was nothin' but bits of meat and bone.” - Zaunite miner
name: Warwick's Blood Hunt

description:
Deal 10 to an enemy. If there are no enemies, deal 10 to the enemy Nexus instead.
+50% chance to Critical Strike.
descriptionRaw: Deal 10 to an enemy. If there are no enemies, deal 10 to the enemy Nexus instead.+50% chance to Critical Strike.
name: Ace in the Hole

description: Deal 1 to a unit or the enemy Nexus, and another, and another.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to a unit or the enemy Nexus, and another, and another.
flavorText: “My influence is vast, and my resources are plentiful. My magic is no different.” - Mel Medarda
name: Solar Snare

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Refill 2 spell mana.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Refill 2 spell mana.
flavorText: “I’ve done what the Council requested, but… why are they planning to investigate one of their own? I must wait… surely the Medardas will see through this ruse.” – unnamed Piltovan
name: Lest

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill a unit.
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: <link=vocab.Terrify><style=Vocab>Terrify</style></link> 1 for each unit that died this round.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Kill a unit.
Round End: Terrify 1 for each unit that died this round.
flavorText: I dreamt of battle. We were on the brink of victory until... it arrived. Men fell, others fled. I couldn't stop its scavenging. I fear it was an omen.
name: Dread Harvester

description: Grant two enemies <link=keyword.Gloom><sprite name=Gloom><style=Keyword>Gloom</style></link> or grant one enemy 2 <link=keyword.Gloom><sprite name=Gloom><style=Keyword>Gloom</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant two enemies Gloom or grant one enemy 2 Gloom.
name: Reap

description: Grant an enemy 2 <link=keyword.Gloom><sprite name=Gloom><style=Keyword>Gloom</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an enemy 2 Gloom.
name: Reap

description: Grant two enemies <link=keyword.Gloom><sprite name=Gloom><style=Keyword>Gloom</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant two enemies Gloom.
name: Reap

description: Grant +0|+3 and heal allies and your Nexus 6.
descriptionRaw: Grant +0|+3 and heal allies and your Nexus 6.
name: Oceanic Dragon Soul

description: Grant +0|+3, <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>, and <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant +0|+3, Tough, and Barrier.
name: Mountainous Dragon Soul

description: Grant +3|+0, <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link>, and 3 <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant +3|+0, Quick Attack, and 3 Impact.
name: Hextech Dragon Soul

description: Grant enemies 2 <link=keyword.Gloom><sprite name=Gloom><style=Keyword>Gloom</style></link>. <link=vocab.Terrify><style=Vocab>Terrify</style></link> 2.
descriptionRaw: Grant enemies 2 Gloom. Terrify 2.
flavorText: “That scarecrow seems to be doing the very opposite of scaring the birds away. I’m startin’ to think it’s full to the brim with birdseed!” - Erson, Demacian farmer
name: Crowstorm

description: Grant +0|+3, <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>Spellshield</style></link>, and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant +0|+3, Spellshield, and Challenger.
name: Cloud Dragon Soul

description:
Game Start: Plant me as a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Nightmare</style></link> deep in the enemy deck.
When I'm summoned, grant enemies 2 <link=keyword.Gloom><sprite name=Gloom><style=Keyword>Gloom</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Game Start: Plant me as a Nightmare deep in the enemy deck.
When I'm summoned, grant enemies 2 Gloom.
levelupDescription: The enemy deck has 15 or fewer cards.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: The enemy deck has 15 or fewer cards.
flavorText: “For so long, they thought me mad, insisting Fiddlesticks was nothing more than a myth, a tale to scare children into behaving. But what I encountered in the woods that day was no myth—it was the living embodiment of fear itself.” - Virgil Castt, Demacian Demonologist
name: Fiddlesticks

description: Your enemy summons a unit from your Nightmares. If it’s a champion they have or their board is full, they create a copy of it in hand instead.
descriptionRaw: Your enemy summons a unit from your Nightmares. If it’s a champion they have or their board is full, they create a copy of it in hand instead.
flavorText: “Little dream… Where have you gone?” - Lillia
name: Nightmare

description:
Game Start: Plant me as a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Nightmare</style></link> deep in the enemy deck.
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant enemies 2 <link=keyword.Gloom><sprite name=Gloom><style=Keyword>Gloom</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Game Start: Plant me as a Nightmare deep in the enemy deck.
When I'm summoned or Attack: Grant enemies 2 Gloom.
flavorText: “I now suspect that speaking of it, or simply thinking of it, is enough to draw it near. The voices began in the woods, beckoning, but now they are right outside my window, and I dare not look. All I want is to wake from this nightmare.” - Virgil Castt, Demacian Demonologist
name: Fiddlesticks

description:
Grant enemies 2 <link=keyword.Gloom><sprite name=Gloom><style=Keyword>Gloom</style></link>. <link=vocab.Terrify><style=Vocab>Terrify</style></link> 2.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Fiddlesticks</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Grant enemies 2 Gloom. Terrify 2.
Create a Fiddlesticks in your deck.
flavorText: “That scarecrow seems to be doing the very opposite of scaring the birds away. I’m startin’ to think it’s full to the brim with birdseed!” - Erson, Demacian farmer
name: Fiddlesticks' Crowstorm

description: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus. Increased by 1 for each attacking subtyped ally.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus. Increased by 1 for each attacking subtyped ally.
name: Pop Blossom

description: Gain omniscience, and gaze upon all that was, is, and ever will be.
descriptionRaw: Gain omniscience, and gaze upon all that was, is, and ever will be.
name: Fragment of Infinity

description: Grant +3|+0 and <nobr>"<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Revive me."</nobr>
descriptionRaw: Grant +3|+0 and "Last Breath: Revive me."
name: Chemtech Dragon Soul

description: Grant +3|+0, <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>, and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant +3|+0, Fearsome, and Overwhelm.
name: Infernal Dragon Soul

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Plant a copy of me in the enemy deck as a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Nightmare</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Plant a copy of me in the enemy deck as a Nightmare.
flavorText: “The nightmares will always chase your light, little dream… but you shine through the burls, so always I will find you.” - Lillia
name: Baleful Seeker

description: <link=vocab.Updraft><style=Vocab>Updraft</style></link> 1 to summon the top ally from your deck.
descriptionRaw: Updraft 1 to summon the top ally from your deck.
flavorText: In the Freljord, the call for battle never goes unanswered.
name: Call to Arms

description:
When you play a <style=Variable>2</style> cost card, <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> me 2.
When I count down, I change my activation number.
<link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 24</style></link><style=Variable></style>: You win the game.
descriptionRaw:
When you play a 2 cost card, advance me 2.
When I count down, I change my activation number.
Countdown 24: You win the game.
name: The Vault

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Plant a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Forgotten Terror</style></link> in the enemy deck as a <link=card.trap><style=AssociatedCard>Nightmare</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Plant a Forgotten Terror in the enemy deck as a Nightmare.
flavorText: I thought we had it handled, 'til the first mount got dragged clean beneath the sand. That was no storm--some monstrosity's lurking in that desert.
name: Lurking Nightmare

flavorText: Chains burst from the ground, sand blinded me. I heard the cries of man and beast alike, then silence. When their voices returned something was wrong. Very wrong.
name: Forgotten Terror

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give enemies -1|-0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give enemies -1|-0 this round.
flavorText: "I heard if you die in your dreams, you die in real life. Yeah, okay. Let's all be extra dramatic." - Vex
name: False Friend
